Plot: The Rat is a tense thriller set in modern-day LA. This is a story of policemen seeking to catch a major drug dealer. It delivers an intense claustrophobic punch that will make you guess, and guess again.
Title: The Rat
Writer: Bill Sarre, Andreas Illmer, Vasily Chuprina, Bill Sarre (story)
Actors: Jonté LeGras, Joel Bryant, Allen Perada, Anthony L. Fernandez
